about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

“Slot Girls” is a game that combines the classic fruit slot machine gameplay with a text-based adventure. Players take on the role of Zhang Er, an employee at an arcade, who plays fruit slot machines to win money and help the female characters in distress.

Story Overview:

The protagonist, Zhang Er, is a young man with a positive outlook on life. In his youth, he went astray and became addicted to fruit slot machines, eventually dropping out of school. After much reflection, he resolves to help those who, like him, have fallen into misfortune by defeating their inner greed and taking down the exploitative arcade owners.

This is the demo version of the game "Eden Fruit". The demo features the first two chapters of the game, while hidden content and additional features are unavailable.

Please note that the demo version of the game does not include DLC content.

  • Processor: Dual Core or higher
